summary: The self-exiled Senjua sibling who stumbled upon some interesting information. Will she obtain the power that she desires?
descriptionHtml:
This is my first follower. I hope you like it as much as I do!
I\'m quite new to modding. I want to make something really cool eventually. 

BIO:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/246991/?
 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
LOCATION: Whiterun Hall of the Dead Catacombs, first door to the left. 

SPELLS: For the time being, use the console to obtain the added spells. 

E.g type \"Help Explosive\" to get the spell\'s ID, then Player.addspell whatevertheIDis
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
If you spot a bug, missing files, etc, please post it in the comments section and I will try to find a solution ASAP. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-UPDATE LOG- 
5/28/13
v.07
Hair color has been changed to look more natural/accurate to the fanlore.  
5/27/13
- V.06
- Updated the CBBE++TBBP version
- Updated the CBBE version
- All clothes can now be viewed and removed if desired. 
- Added a new type of arrow, Chakra Arrows, which explode upon impact. 
- Added a new spell, Explosive Corrosive Smog
5/24/13
-Added all armors, piercings, etc. Brushed up the file organization. Should now be truly standalone. 
5/21/13
-Added a normal CBBE version, fixed the mouth
5/20/13
- Fixed the tintmasks on the NarutoLess version, the gray face bug should be gone now...
- Removed the more weight version, has become part of the main mod. 
5/20/13 
-Added a Naruto-less version, see optional files 
-Added a version with more weight



The armor in the screenshot is from: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29411//?
White Mage armor. 


-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
INSTALLATION:
Either use NMM to install it or drop the contents of the .rar into your data folder

/my first mod ever
Let me know how you like/dislike it

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-Future Plans-
Create custom spells for her
A custom quest line


-----------------------CREDITS--------------------------------
Regn - Facial Piercings
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35056

Caliente for Caliente\'s Body Mod - Big Bottom Edition v3
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666

Gattai - For the neck collar
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19257/?

Silver0236 and Asianboy345 - Terra Armors UNPB with BBP-TBBP
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22023//?

Dwiss - Dwiss Eyewear
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33853//?

ChronoTrigger777 - Bodyslide ++ 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32731//?

TKtk - Pretty Face 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7887//?


I have no idea where the black hand amulet came from and can\'t find any info on it. Speak now, author, or forever hold your peace.

Bradfo89 - For beta testing this follower <3

Clayton_Wilson - Naruto Jutsu, and for helping me with the spells
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=19742
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Also, feel free to post screenshots. My rig currently can\'t support some of the high-end enbs. It would be nice to see my characters in HD. :)

Remember to endorse if you like it!
author: Undivide
